description:
Solve the puzzles in time and use the clues you get to save the victim from the killer
قم بحل الألغاز في الوقت المناسب و استخدم الدلائل التي تحصل عليها لإنقاذ الضحية من القاتل

-----

Instructions:
each 10 minutes you will receive a hint for what the victim will do next.
to get the hint, you have to solve the puzzle. click on a symbol and replace it with a letter using your keyboard.
try to identify the victim using these hints. in the last 10 minutes, talk to victim.

----
